overview: Sam, a sex hungry director, gets bitten by a cannibal and suddenly discovers a newly found joy in eating human meat! RG is a student in love with the lovely Svetlana who just so happens to end up in Sam's plate. The two men set off on a lonely journey, each one trying to satisfy their own kind of hunger. Which one will prevail? The hunger for love... or the hunger for human flesh?!
title: Greek Psycho Cannibal
